title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear Bobby Wanting to Buy Eddie's Soul (Week of 11/23 and 11/30)
itunes:title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear Bobby Wanting to Buy Eddie's Soul (Week of 11/23 and 11/30)
description:
This edition of the podcast features behind the scenes from show members and moments that happened after we turned off the microphones. Morgan brings in Eddie to talk about Bobby wanting to buy his soul recently. She asks Amy about her gift from Eddie getting to smash a TV. Scuba Steve also shares some behind the scenes of the segment his did as part of him winning Employee of the Month!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
